title: Best of The Herd: 08/27/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 08/27/2019
description:
Colin defends Colts fans after Aaron Rodgers calls them out for booing Andrew Luck.  He predicts the record for every single NFL team in 2019 and some of them are going to get fans upset.  Plus, former NFL WR TJ Houshmandzadeh talks about Luck's retirement and why the Quarterback has to be a certain personality to be successful.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
